title: Anatomy of a Betrayal
description: Mr. & Mrs. Smith meets Past Lives in Anatomy of a Betrayal, a spy novel with a love story at its heart, about two rival graduate students caught on opposite sides of an FBI investigation when one is accused of spying for a foreign governmentâ€”and the other recruited as an informant to catch her, inspired by the true story of the persecution of Chinese American scientists.
author: Grace D. Li
